pages.title: Chinese Giant Salamander
pages.text: The Chinese giant salamander ($(o)Andrias davidianus$()) is one of the largest salamanders and one of the largest amphibians in the world.$(br2)It is fully aquatic and is endemic to rocky mountain streams and lakes in the Yangtze river basin of central China.

pages.title: Chinese Giant Salamander
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:food_turtle_raw$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
